name: dezufnocosem
text: who here hasn't been in the situation of having to eat their phone

name: thelastwhiteman
text: THIS IS NOT A GOD-DAMNED PHONE RESTAURANT!

name: fineoakstructure
text: oh man how come i never thought of this before

name: mr_pete
text: The humor is simple but subtly sugared by onomatopoeia.

name: peng33
text: marred slightly by the fact that... that is, in no way, what eating a phone sounds like.

name: benhead
text: I think it's what TRYING to eat a phone sounds like.

name: ambala
text: Phone.  It's what's for dinner.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, lamboyster, Overmedicated, farqussus, illgamesh, Doc_Rostov, morbo, dr_sexlove)

name: eric
text: Teodor hurridly eats the phone before lyle thinks of it.

name: saint
text: lyle COULD just eat Teodor

name: manxome
text: Not on the sofa, fellas.

name: rosie
text: I like how Teodor reaches towards the money on the counter, then withdraws his hand as he realizes that the scheme ain't gonna pan out.

name: feets
text: Dude, that is the list.

name: ssddr
text: thats a pretty good summary on the usefullness of taxis in modern society

name: f1shst1ck
text: I wonder what he was gonna do with the blacklight?

name: featurelessvoid
text: Turn it on, maybe.

name: bixschmix
text: Also, do a little dance.

name: catgrl131
text:
Make a little love!
Get down tonight!

name: falala
text: A comment left by falala was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Triptaphane, madnes, aogusky)

name: zapatos
text: one comes after the other.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: not with me.

name: history
text: Make sure the couch is clean.

name: rickshaw
text: The punchline in this strip is Teodor's burn on the taxi service

name: greymantledwolf
text: at first i thought he was so hungry he started eating the phone, but now i realize he was just frustrated.

name: i_love_kate
text: No matter how hard I look, I cannot picture those lines as his mouth.

name: pwb
text: A comment left by pwb was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, NeoNaoNeo, rowboat, hcaz, farqussus, bixschmix, ANinasaurusRex)

name: mufferz
text: this is the first comic that made me realize that teodor's mouth wasn't the little lines coming off his nose, i always thought he always looked displeased

name: godfatherofsouls
text: It's kind of gross.

name: quartzblade
text: YES. I still have trouble visualizing where teodor and Cornelius's mouths are.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: hah! he looks like pop-eye that way!

name: heccibiggs
text: I'm trying to see it like that and I absolutely can't manage it. Seriously. I'm not trying to call you stupid or anything, I just literally can't see it any other way than how it's supposed to be.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: squint your eyes and tilt your head, then jump on one leg and pat your head and rub your stomach AT THE SAME TIME . then you'll see it.

name: snowman
text: I...just cannot see that.

name: teezee
text: Man, check out Phillipe's mouth, now that is nasty

name: niggar
text: Teodor's culinary opportunities have sure come a long way.

name: jesler729
text: For some reason, when I first read this, I though Teodor was blowing up a balloon in the last panel. I have no idea what that would imply.

name: hbaranov
text: A chubby Sir, your poor sight made me physically laugh!

name: relaxing
text: it DOES look like a balloon!  chubby!

name: hamscout
text: ...I have to check my notes, but I believe this is how PeaPod was born...

name: cjsalt
text: THESE KNIVES

name: mxh
text: I love how a lot of the early strips are focused on how exactly a bunch of stuffed animals obtain food.

name: cobra_lionfist
text: I love how Teodor is suddenly overcome by determination

name: radarjammer
text: Teodor and I know that you truly haven't gotten low 'till you're eating ketchup on saltines.

name: kkrusty
text: it took me almost 7 years to realize that teodor is not blowing up a balloon in panel 6.

name: tekende
text: Strangely enough, the inventor of the taxi cab, William P. Taxi, did indeed get the idea from his mother during a conversation in which William expressed his frustration at being unable to find a rewarding career.

name: woodenteeth
text: Mr. Cab, William's life long friend was listening into the conversation at the time and guilted him into including him on the project. Ironically enough Mr. Cab died four days later attempting to eat a phone.

name: wfl
text: I recently discovered that a local taxi service used to pick up and deliver alcohol to peoples' homes.  Dunno if they still do, but methinks a good bottle of scotch would be a nice test subject in the near future. :)

name: zapatos
text: When I was working at Big5 I had to load a weight set into a cab.  That was crappy.

name: mattylite
text: Man, Teodor's just furiously eatin' that phone.

name: teezee
text: He is just cold eating it.

name: punkmonkey
text: Teodor eats the telephone with a ferocity seen only when Philippe helps himself to King's Piss.

name: griffypoo
text: Took me a couple looks to realize he was eating a phone, and not randomly making a baloon animal to eat instead.
